plot: An orphan drummer boy who hated humanity finds his life changed forever when he meets three wise men on route to Bethlehem.
title: The Little Drummer Boy
plot_es: An orphan drummer boy who hated humanity finds his life changed forever when he meets three wise men on route to Bethlehem.
plot_en: An orphan drummer boy who hated humanity finds his life changed forever when he meets three wise men on route to Bethlehem.
